name: Pickles!
description:
Autumn is here, which means Nana has invited magical forest creatures over to make them some of her delicious pickles, relishes and jams. Help her pick fruits from her tree and vegetables from her garden, chop them, preserve them and make her friends happy. See how many orders you can fill before the day ends, or relax and take things at your own pace.

Controls: WASD to move, left click to interact with an object when next to it, right click to drop items from the inventory. Escape opens the pause menu.

This is our first game, made during the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022.

Credits: Leo (art), Nemanja (programming & music)

* The game has not been tested on Linux
